website_summaries.verdict: The best budget option for a reliable, consistent wireless extender you can place around the home.
pros: The individual WiFi coverage area is good enough for a single small-to-medium bedroom or common area around the house
cons: Setup instructions can be confusing and hard to follow when installing the extender

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up but no improvement in coverage. I wanted to extend my dual band WiFi router coverage from the lower level of my house to the garage and front yard. This unit appeared as an additional network access point but was actually lower in signal strength than the primary router signal. Multiple resets and locations attempted but never seemed to act or perform as I would have expected. It may have been a faulty unit but it is being returned and I will try a different product and manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: T. W. Cote

customer_reviews.title: Wi-fi range extender that works
customer_reviews.text: My router is on one end of my home and was experiening weaker signals on my wife's iPad and my smart tv while streaming movies,etc. This little jewel was just what the doctor ordered. I now have no problems as described and now even get strong signals in the other end of my home and even out back on my patio. Works great, easy to set up,and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best extender I have found
customer_reviews.text: Best extender I have found...shelved a NetGear product and returned a TP-Link product. Setup was easy and after setup configuration, web access to the extender was a snap. The 2.4 GHz band's signal at -34 dBm is at a maximum; the 5 GHz band's signal strength is -53 dBm which is excellent. I have my smart TV on the 5 GHz band and it's located in a semi blind-spot. Now I'm keeping my TV connected without always dropping and am happy for that.
customer_reviews.author: Dondi

customer_reviews.title: Not So Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because reviews stated it was easy to set up. WRONG! Once it was set up it kept stating to move it to a new location. Once it decided to accept a location it improved the wifi signal by only one bar. Will be sending this back more than likely. Will leave it plugged in for a few days to decide what I want to do. Tired of buying things that state easy ser up or they don't work as stated from Amazon. I say save your money buy a different brand. Sent back save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Leda Rose Dumond

customer_reviews.title: Worked so well I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and made wifi life in my home less frustrating! Easy to set up. Worked so well I bought a second one. Both said I should move them out further but that was impossible and doesn't appear to be a problem having them both in a close vicinity to the main wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Carol from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the Linksys RE6250
customer_reviews.text: The Linksys RE6250 is easy to install and connects to the router easily using WPS. It shows up with it's SSID and easily connects any device that requests a login. Unfortunately, that's where it all stops. Data passthrough is almost non-existent. 90% of the time it's at zero. No data. The other 10% of the time it passes data very slow and intermittently. This happens regardless of where it is located. Many reboots and re-installs always ended up with the same results - unuseable. Replaced it with a TP-Link Range extender for $24.99 (half the price of the Linksys RE6250), placed in the exact same spot and the TP-Link works perfectly. The Linksys was a waste of $50.
customer_reviews.author: L. Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Works great for an older house
customer_reviews.text: We are finally able to get wifi to all critical corners (teen rooms) of the house. We live in a larger, old (late 1800s) compartmentalized type house. Modem is downstairs, and all the bedrooms are on an upper level, so that's where we placed this gadget. No more whiney teenagers. Setup was easy, used my cell phone to do it. Instructions are very thorough and professionally composed (compared to patchy bad English instructions).
customer_reviews.author: DeBee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My Laptop in the garage showed 4 bars but download speeds were abysmal. Took forever for any of my vendors' sites to load, including Amazon. Since I already have a LinkSys wireless router I ordered one of these to see how well it worked. Using the WPS setup, it took about 10 minutes to get both channels connected to my router, and now my garage has excellent connectivity. As an example, previous waits for Amazon home page to load took nearly 5 minutes. Now it loads in well under 30 seconds! I've ordered an additional one for the living room for my Apple TV and wireless Blue Ray units.
customer_reviews.author: Helo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up; works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a different extender by another company that didn't work. So I decided to purchase this one as a replacement. This worked perfectly. Took me 5 minutes to set up, and had devices connected in no time, and can now get connected on my back deck.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Setup is not as easy as 123, but works well once setup.
customer_reviews.text: So, the setup isn't as easy as 123. First, I was having an issue connecting to the extender but I've run into a similar issue before. The fix was to turn on airplane mode and then it worked. However, after that it would connect to my Linksys router but fail on setup. Moving the extender wouldn't work, master reset wouldn't work. Finally, I had to log into my Linksys router to set it up via WPS and that finally worked.... It works, but it is not seemless as you have to setup your device to access the network with an "_ext" network.. Once setup, works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: nbiron

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this model
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this Range Extender....impossible to connect with or to your already existing router. First problem is they direct you to a connect screen and ask you to click on your particular model to proceed but the model I purchased, RE6250, is not listed/shown on the how to connect menu. I'm tempted to return but right now I'm so frustrated that I don't feel like clicking on anymore buttons or trying any harder to be a satisfied customer. Bob Washington DC
customer_reviews.author: bmrang

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the Netgear AC750 which lasted all of 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the Netgear AC750 which lasted all of 6 months. The installation was simple, just plug it into the AC outlet. Open your computer's browser and the Linksys generates an installation webpage on your non-internet home network. Follow the instructions and "Voila!", Internet! Well done Linksys. Now, the test is if it is durable and longlasting. Will report back.
customer_reviews.author: Tootlum Gortner

customer_reviews.title: perfect fix to extend wi-if around my house
customer_reviews.text: i love this Wi-Fi extender. Took a little time to find the sweet spot to set it up in my home, but the app instructed me though every step! For some reason we never had stable wi-fi in the upstairs left corner of our house.. which happens to be my office and bedroom. It did keep dropping the first few days, but that was my fault for not pushing the little orange button on the side of the unit. I couldn't be happier. I can now run multiple devices and my amazon tv simultaneously without a hitch. i'm buying another for the other end of the house. it's easy, simple and works better than i expected!
customer_reviews.author: dizzyinsomniac

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup.  Quality Extender.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Found a couple YouTube videos that show how to set them up using the WPS feature on your router. Be sure to do this twice for both gHz ranges. Linksys provides good instructions too and their knowledge base on their website is extensive to help you troubleshoot. I’ve had absolutely no issues. Improved my Wi-Fi range inside my two story house.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Did now work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Connected to my home wireless network....ATT Uverse with Pace 2Wire modem/router. But, could not connect to Internet on PC, tablet or Android phone. Spent an hour on the phone with customers service. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Not maintaining connection with router p
customer_reviews.text: Keeps dropping out. I’ve moved it around to different places but it will always drop the data connection. I can connect to the extender but it’s not staying connected to our (new) linksys router. So lame. I might get an access point instead and stick with Ethernet to the router.
customer_reviews.author: Damos11

customer_reviews.title: No more buffering!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the extender to attempt to reduce buffering on my Roku. Also 4k content was degraded because of the reduced throughput. The extender did cure these problems. At first, the connection was dropped a couple of times. This was solved by moving the device away from the Roku. The recommendation is at least 18". Also switched the router to use channel 11. Now no dropouts. I am completely satisfied with the device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not buying anything else from Linksys.
customer_reviews.text: purchased in July of 17 and suddenly stopped working in June of 18. Went online, their website is not at all helpful. Went on customer support chat and after 20 mins of frustration was told I would have to pay $30 for a solution. All I was trying to do was reset the password without access. 45 mins invested and then they want money? Forget it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: I talked to Linksys because this still was not working ...
customer_reviews.text: I talked to Linksys because this still was not working as well as I would have hoped. The agent told me that this will extend the WiFi but only at 1/2 the speed, so there was still buffering and intermittent connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: steinbeck

customer_reviews.title: Get a newer model
customer_reviews.text: I had to get Texh support involved to get this to work due to the fact the age of the product was almost not even supported. This was a little aggravating but once complete we have been using it for several months now and it has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: golfnutinga

customer_reviews.title: It absolutely does exactly what it says it will do ...
customer_reviews.text: It absolutely does exactly what it says it will do. Once you figure out how to pair it to your wi-fi ,that is the only complaint, or I would have given 5 stars. Finding the right website was the first hurdle, then you pick your device by photos on the site, of course for my device there was no photo. So I had to guess, on one that looked close. Well I did finally figure it out. I think if you're more familiar with the equipment and more tec oriented it would be a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Sloat

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It took all of 5 minutes to install (would have been less but I had to look up a password). Very clear instructions. I highly recommend it. I have Samsung phone & tablet and it works perfectly with them. The Extender I had prior to this one would not stay connected to my very recent model phone & tablet. The Linksys works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: red riding hood

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am in IT and I have installed similar products on multiple occasions. My client had been experiencing a degrading signal from the WiFi originating from his home to his workshop located in a separate building. Installing the Linksys AC750 was quick and easy and corrected his signal problems.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Danger

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. No more video lag in Netflix and YouTube. I was having Wi-Fi signal issues at yhe from of my house until I plugged this in. I could've spent the same on a new router but this was good as it was just easy to plug it in and follow the directions for set up. I was able to do the set up on my phones web browser so that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable, but does take a speed hit.
customer_reviews.text: Have had for more than a month, and this unit has not had the dropped service the previous Linksys unit was plagued with. It does reduce the speed of the link by almost half, but it always works, and my speed is high enough that the speed reduction is not a major issue. Simple to install, and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have poor and slow wifi signal in my own home just ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! This thing does work!! I live in a "dead zone" for cell phones and such...I have poor and slow wifi signal in my own home just rooms away from the router. This puppy gives me a good strong signal in the other side of my house! BUY it.. You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Lorenda Moon

customer_reviews.title: Linksys AC 750
customer_reviews.text: We have tried off and on for 10 months to get this product to perform as advertised. I called customer support today and was told that with my current UBEE router I needed the RE7000 range extender because it had a speed of 1900 and covered 10,000 sq feet. The current extender the AC 750 only has 750 speed.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I did
customer_reviews.text: I was having nothing but trouble with my Wi-Fi. I had the cable company out and the cable guy told me to order one of these Wi-Fi extenders. I am so happy I did. I work from home and my Wi-Fi was so slow it was like I was working on a dial up modem! This solved the problem. Excellent product. I went from having 2 bars to a full 5! Perfect! Thank you! :D
customer_reviews.author: Amber Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for the price
customer_reviews.text: I live upstairs from where the main router is in the house. I was getting a bad signal and my Netflix etc kept fading in and out. Once I installed this easy to install product I was good to go. No issues with WiFi now!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to set up, takes a few minutes and finding the optimal location is partly dependent on where you have electrical outlets near the intended path. I installed mine on an outside wall under a waterproof cover in order to extend wifi coverage to my garage, also extends to pool area about 100 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly and didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Very complicated to set up, tech support personnel were pretty much clueless. Item would connect, then lose connection. Returned. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjulee

customer_reviews.title: Full signal—Great
customer_reviews.text: Was getting a very weak and useless WiFi signal in my apartment. Tried several solutions then got this Linksys extender and it is like being on top of the router. Simple installallation, then up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Plug it in and Ta Da you've got WiFi
customer_reviews.text: What a great product...plug it in and Ta Da you've got WiFi where you want it. The only negative is that there is no ethernet port on the device. Dual band connectivity is great.
customer_reviews.author: American Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I needed to extend my signal across the house to stream to my smart tv. I bought this after reading the great reviews. It was super easy to setup. Took only about 5 minutes including the time for it to tell me to switch locations for better performance.
customer_reviews.author: kerry in salt lake city

customer_reviews.title: Linksys AC750
customer_reviews.text: I had I hope this would solve my WiFi problem, but it did NOT extend or boost my WiFi into the weak signal areas. Linksys tech support solution was to try to sell me a new Linksys router.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creates a separate SSID.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. It's fine, I clearly didn't read enough about this because it creates a separate SSID, which is exactly what I DIDNT want. It works, it's just annoying and not what I preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and has been installed without too much of an issue. Just had to find the right location to accomplish desired results.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxontheweb

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty rad. There is no lag or difference between ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty rad. There is no lag or difference between connecting to the AC750 extensions vs. connecting to my normal router, and the range is substantially better.
customer_reviews.author: Humpy

customer_reviews.title: Good device, but not easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works well once you can get it setup. Had to try several times to get it setup properly. Wound up using alternative method
customer_reviews.author: Don Birkelbach

customer_reviews.title: Stops working...
customer_reviews.text: The set up process for this is relatively easy, however, it stopped working for me each day. I had to unplug the device each day and reset it so it would work. It’s a hassle. I even went so far as to try placing it in different rooms, but always the same problem. I’ve stopped using it altogether and just decided to upgrade my modem.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Parks

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect miracles
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me but could be the way my house is laid out.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah T.

customer_reviews.title: Complete crap
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. I used the spot finder feature. In the “ideal zone” the range extender’s max speed was 10 mbps. Without using it at all, my minimum router speed is 30 mbps. Complete crap. Returning device tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: My WiFi blind spot is no more!
customer_reviews.text: The Wifi extender works as intended. I used the WPS buttons on the router and extender to pair the devices. They linked immediately as described in the setup leaflet that comes with the device. Now my WiFi blind spot is blind no more! I can also unplug the extender and move it around without setting it up again. It links up with the router automatically if there is at least 2 bars of coverage. I’m happy with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Richy

customer_reviews.title: It’s up and running and results are great.  WiFi is consistently fast now.
customer_reviews.text: This item installed quickly and easily after I got an appropriate router for it. Tech support was super!
customer_reviews.author: Fred T.

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Does not work. Have to constantly reset and set up as if it was out of the box. And when I do set up speeds are abysmal. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Greg K.

customer_reviews.title: Good extender
customer_reviews.text: Works good for the most part but sometimes doesn’t reach where it’s suppose to. But overall pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Mckell brockbank

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work just fine. Provides feedback on signal strength which was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just fine. Provides feedback on signal strength which was a nice aspect.
customer_reviews.author: John Santana

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: Worked sort of at first. Now doesn't work at all. Wifi signal is great but the internet speed is crazy slow. Repeated Speedtests show sub 1 mbps (unusable). Speeds coming off the main router are 20 mbps +. I have NOT contacted tech support for assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have been easier to set up or work more perfectly! Finally have wi-fi in my bedroom where the router wouldn't reach.
customer_reviews.author: KBR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy setup and connects right with my linksys router. Even uses the same password.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it is supposed to and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and it arrived very quickly. It helps extend from one side of the first floor to the other side of the house in the basement. It's very easy to set up and tells you if it's in the optimal location. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Yelton

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. From the timer I took it out of the box it took me only minutes to set it up with my Android phone. The range to our bedroom now allows us to stream video that we couldn't do before the Linksys AC750 was set-up.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Daeschlein

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Might just be me but this product just isn't worth it, it takes away from your main router and it also just stopped working a few times. Spend a little more money and get a better one maybe?
customer_reviews.author: K.Stallone

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay connected...
customer_reviews.text: I have called tech support at least once sometimes twice a week. Keeps losing the connection...I was told last night it was no longer eligible for tech support and return date was the end of June. Not happy...I have a small one story house and this is not worth the time...trouble or money...
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely improved my reception around the corner from the router, and upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get this to sync with my laptop, modem or phone. I couldn't find this specific model number on the site either.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Poor reliability
customer_reviews.text: Well the product seemed fine new. Others had spoken of failures which I unfortunately ignored. After 4 months it became quite variable and slow, then failed. Believe what you see in the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: daniel l. costa

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. I had previously installed a competitors wifi extender and was highly disappointed. The Linksys repeater is the standard.
customer_reviews.author: S. Springer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It was so easy to setup and now I have wi-fi in all the areas of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Maijul

customer_reviews.title: Extra boost..
customer_reviews.text: Great WiFi extender. Helps with all the different devices I have. Phones, tablets, cameras. Makes connection run smoother and faster.
customer_reviews.author: bobtownbuck

customer_reviews.title: No more dead zones!
customer_reviews.text: We have rooms in our house that are complete internet dead zones. They could not keep an internet signal. This fixed that problem in a jiffy. It was easy to set up and provides a strong constant signal.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: AC750 did a tremendous job. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Did a wonderful job. Purchased another one that did not work. This one is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Nace

customer_reviews.title: Great range/ easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Easily set up the extender in about 5 minutes. Now I get WiFi in my garage on the other side of the house from my router in the basement and in the rear of my yard.
customer_reviews.author: BrianCa

customer_reviews.title: Extend WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Provides good coverage in hard to reach WiFi areas of the house. Pretty easy to set up especially if you router has WPS.
customer_reviews.author: William Winter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, broadcasts to my metal pole building 80' away.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Beisker

customer_reviews.title: Great fix!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fixed our internet issues in a two story home!
customer_reviews.author: Own

customer_reviews.title: Don't Look Further!
customer_reviews.text: Not the smartest person when it comes to electronic advances but I had used a Linksys Router prior to this purchase of the Wi-Fi Range Extender and found it easy to install and it solved my problem. I live in a 2-story block home with my Wi-Fi modem located on the 2nd floor and the extender was purchased to cover the longest distance on the 1st floor. After trying several locations to reach the maximum strength of the extender I found the site which gave me the very best reception. Not only did Linksys solve my problem but it lived up to its reputation of quality and easy installation. Would certainly recommend Linksys over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Use it to reach dead spots or spots that have a weak signal in my house. Seems to be a genuine improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Carver

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed! Easy set up, but won't connect to internet 80% of time time. It says "connected, but no internet."
customer_reviews.author: PeaceKeeper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Never could get it to work - also my bad I didn't want a separate ssid -
customer_reviews.author: Denny A

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a terrible time with the wifi on my desktop because of the distance from my router. Seriously getting knocked off the wifi all the time and unable to download anything. As soon as I set up this wifi extender, my life changed. So grateful for this product and how much more efficiently I can work at my desktop!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Sorrells

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Works well. I’ll probably buy another so I don’t have keep moving it back and forth to the two dead zone areas in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Christin P

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Easy to set up. We found our "hot spot" easily and now have very strong signal to the rear bedroom. Disclaimer: My daughter who is a little tech savvy set this up but she told me it was very easy to use. Anyway, it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: dvv

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: Was having issues extending signal and a place this in my garage and haven’t had another issue
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, eliminates all dead spots in my house. Also reaches out into the yard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This model was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This model was very easy to set up. I have purchased other units in the past that I cannot get to work, and the instruction page with many pages long. This model set up was super easy. If you have had issues in the past with setting up extenders try this model you will not be disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Fitch

customer_reviews.title: A moron can set this up. That was a ...
customer_reviews.text: A moron can set this up. That was a plus for me. Purchased another one from a different provider. It was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Ripley

customer_reviews.title: still no good. Really surprised at all the 5 star ratings
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely junk, I have tried and tried to make it work in a 2 story house and can barely keep the signal alive. Gone through and moved it to every single spot I could find, still no good. Really surprised at all the 5 star ratings.
customer_reviews.author: aretw0

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Linksys AC750 works great and was very easy to set up. Picked up our WiFi signal right away. We purchased the range extender to increase our WiFi signal so our Ring security lights/camera would connect.
customer_reviews.author: Jan L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Range  -  Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and range is great. We were having trouble gettin WiFi in our family room and outside on our deck. This solved both problems, and I had it set up in less than 15 minutes. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Horton-Lechuk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product. It has help us in better WIFI connections.
customer_reviews.author: golferwill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: will probably be sending back; it doesn't seem to change anything
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've had installed approximately 100' from the router and it works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Coxx110

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and it works great. My house is not that large but for some reason the internet at the back of the house was spotty. We think there was some sort of interference through the kitchen(microwave or refrigerator). This solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Beth Harris

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and cares a great signal. Highly recommend this in a high tech house.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Works inconsistently. Sometimes it’s decent but many times it’s not! Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Love to Shop

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Works great. Needed something to extend wifi out to the pool area...about 100'.
customer_reviews.author: Plaid Man

customer_reviews.title: Just take your money and set it on fire. This thing is junk.
customer_reviews.text: Just. Doesn't. Work! I have to unplug it and plug it back in whenever I want the signal to work and even then it is spotty. Don't buy this piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great ro extend our WiFi to an area not reached before
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weber

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it to work. Product will not sync ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to work. Product will not sync with my wifi system. Can't find this product when I try to get instructions online. There are no pictures of this exact product model when trying to find it online to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not connect at all tried four times and it never worked
customer_reviews.author: kevin V.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this extender to help my WiFi get around my 1800’s stone farmhouse. Now I have full bars everywhere I go! Pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and Netflix immediately stopped buffering plus the picture got much sharper
customer_reviews.author: JBruno1954

customer_reviews.title: Works great 👍
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are not for the really technologically challenged like me. I'm sure for those that are at least minimally adept at electronic gadgets it would be a breeze. I went with the second installation process which entailed getting the unit in the same room as the WiFi router and pressing a button on each device within two minutes. They connected automatically and I was able to move the extender halfway between the router and the computer at the front of the house. If I can do it anyone can do it.
customer_reviews.author: JackinJax

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well written instructions (once I realized what type of modem I had), has extended robust coverage to my patio.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Green

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Just remember to be in the same room as your router when you do the initial set up. I have a happy daughter, now.
customer_reviews.author: DMac1959

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Helped out tremendously for streaming, and very simple to set up
customer_reviews.author: Pat Phillips

customer_reviews.title: ... hesitated buying this extender and now I am totally satisfied. Now I can connect from my hammock to ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh I hesitated buying this extender and now I am totally satisfied. Now I can connect from my hammock to look at news and so on. I would have cursed myself if I did not.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and works great. Wanted it to service my side porch and it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Nye

customer_reviews.title: Buy something that works
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Does not have much range, there is only a few feet difference. Money spent for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel N.

product_meta.title: Linksys AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Range Extender / Wi-Fi Booster (RE6250)
product_meta.description: Eliminate dead zones and Boost Wi-Fi from your router with the Linksys AC750 Wi-Fi range extender (RE6250). with AC1200 Wi-Fi speeds (N300 + AC433), households will enjoy fast, uninterrupted Wi-Fi indoors and Outside it features spot Finder technology and WPS for simple setup and optimal placement in relation to your router. It works with all Wi-Fi routers, including those from service providers, to deliver uninterrupted streaming, online gaming, and seamless content sharing.
feature_bullets: Eliminate WiFi dead zones in your home and expands coverage better HD streaming, gaming, and more
Easy setup with Push Button Connect
Works with all Wi-Fi routers or ISP-supplied gateways
Guides you to the best placement in your home with Spotfinder technology

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars329 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
